name: Condiment Combat
description:
Player 1 - Ketchup

Player 2 - Mustard

Either play against the Computer or another player in this two player fighting game!

A,W,D for movement, S for shooting, and SPACEBAR for throwing - Player 1

LEFT, RIGHT, UP for movement, DOWN for shooting, and ENTER for throwing - PLAYER 2

MAY THE BEST CONDIMENT WIN!
